title: my cousins account was stolen
body: so my cousin wanted to log back in and play but couldn't. we looked up his old tag and it was on op.gg but when I clicked refresh after a while the name changed but I have a screenshot showing it was his old tag before the change. he also has bank account statements from riot point purchases as well as he lives at the IP address the account was made at. he made a ticket but figured can't hurt to use all the options.the account name was changed and was used to play season 6 and season 7 when he never played ranked in those seasons

replies.body: Sadly we can't do account recovery from here on the boards, otherwise everyone who looked would have your info =\ . Have your friend continue talking with the agents in his ticket and they'll be able to help ^_^
but he cant even log on to his account to check the ticket. the password recovery gave him a pbe account
